RefParameter.Name: advanced_settings
RefParameter.Description: By enabling this feature, you have access to risky settings that could be harmful for your device.

RefParameter.Name: OB_Read_Out_Protection_active
RefParameter.Description: By activating the feature Advanced settings, the RDP value 2 will be available to be set.

RefParameter.Name: RDPLevel
RefParameter.Description:
Bits 7:0 RDP[7:0]: Readout protection level.
OB_RDP_LEVEL_0: Level 0 (readout protection not active).
OB_RDP_LEVEL_1: Level 1 (memories readout protection active).
OB_RDP_LEVEL_2:Level 2 (chip read protection active)
In this level, the protection level 1 is guaranteed. In addition, the CPU debug port, the boot from RAM (boot RAM mode) and the boot from system memory (bootloader mode) are no more available.
In user execution mode (boot FLASH mode), all operations are allowed on the main flash memory.
The CPU debug port is also disabled under reset.
STMicroelectronics is not able to perform analysis on defective parts on which the level 2 protection has been set

PossibleValue.Diagnostic: Too risky: All debug features are disabled

RefParameter.Name: OB_BOR_EN
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 8 BOR_EN: Brown out reset enable.
0: Configurable brown out reset disabled, power-on reset defined by POR/PDR levels
1: Configurable brown out reset enabled, values of BORR_LEV and BORF_LEV taken into account

RefParameter.Name: OB_BORR_level
RefParameter.Description:
Bits 10:9 BORR_LEV[1:0]: BOR threshold at rising VDD supply.
Rising VDD crossings this threshold releases the reset signal.
00: BOR rising level 1 with threshold around 2.1 V
01: BOR rising level 2 with threshold around 2.3 V
10: BOR rising level 3 with threshold around 2.6 V
11: BOR rising level 4 with threshold around 2.9 V

RefParameter.Name: OB_BORF_level
RefParameter.Description:
Bits 12:11 BORF_LEV[1:0]: BOR threshold at falling VDD supply.
Falling VDD crossings this threshold activates the reset signal.
00: BOR falling level 1 with threshold around 2.0 V
01: BOR falling level 2 with threshold around 2.2 V
10: BOR falling level 3 with threshold around 2.5 V
11: BOR falling level 4 with threshold around 2.8 V

RefParameter.Name: OB_NRST_STOP_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 13 NRST_STOP: Reset generated when entering Stop mode.
0:Reset generated when entering the Stop mode.
1: No reset generated when entering the Stop mode.

RefParameter.Name: OB_NRST_STDBY_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 14 NRST_STDBY: Reset generated when entering Standby mode.
0:Reset generated when entering the Standby mode.
1: No reset generate when entering the Standby mode.

RefParameter.Name: OB_NRST_SHDW_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 15 NRST_SHDW: Reset generation in Shutdown mode.
0:Reset generated when entering the Shutdown mode.
1: No reset generated when entering the Shutdown mode.

RefParameter.Name: OB_IWDG_SW_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 16 IWDG_SW: Independent watchdog selection.
0:Hardware independent watchdog selected.
1: Software independent watchdog selected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_IWDG_STOP_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 17 IWDG_STOP: Independent watchdog counter freeze in Stop mode.
0:Independent watchdog counter frozen in Stop mode.
1: Independent watchdog counter running in Stop mode.

RefParameter.Name: OB_IWDG_STDBY_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 18 IWDG_STDBY: Independent watchdog counter freeze in Standby mode.
0:Independent watchdog counter frozen in Standby mode.
1: Independent watchdog counter running in Standby mode.

RefParameter.Name: OB_WWDG_SW_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 19 WWDG_SW: Window watchdog selection.
0:Hardware window watchdog selected.
1: Software window watchdog selected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_RAM_PARITY_CHECK_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 22 RAM_PARITY_CHECK: SRAM parity check control enable/disable.
0:Enable.
1: Disable.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nBOOT_SEL_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 24 NBOOT0_SEL: BOOT0 signal source selection.
This option bit defines the source of the BOOT0 signal.
0:BOOT0 pin (legacy mode)
1: NBOOT0 option bit

RefParameter.Name: OB_NBOOT1_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 25 NBOOT1: Boot configuration
Together with the BOOT0 pin or option bit NBOOT0 (depending on NBOOT_SEL option bit configuration), this bit selects boot mode from the main flash memory, SRAM or the system memory.

RefParameter.Name: OB_NBOOT0_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 26 nBOOT0: NBOOT0 option bit.
0:NBOOT0 = 0.
1: NBOOT0 = 1.

RefParameter.Name: OB_NRST_MODE_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 28:27 NRST_MODE[1:0]: NRST pin configuration.
1: Reset input only: a low level on the NRST pin generates system reset; internal RESET is not propagated to the NRST pin.
2: Standard GPIO: only internal RESET is possible.
3: Bidirectional reset: the NRST pin is configured in reset input/output (legacy) mode.

RefParameter.Name: OB_INPUT_RESET_HOLDER_UI
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 29 IRHEN: Internal reset holder enable bit.
0:Internal resets are propagated as simple pulse on NRST pin 1: Internal resets drives NRST pin low until it is seen as low level

RefParameter.Name: OB_WRP1A_PSTR_Value
RefParameter.Description: Bank 1 WPR first area A start page

RefParameter.Name: OB_WRP1A_PEND_Value
RefParameter.Description: Bank 1 WPR first area A end page

RefParameter.Name: OB_WRP1B_PSTR_Value
RefParameter.Description: Bank 1 WPR first area B start page

RefParameter.Name: OB_WRP1B_PEND_Value
RefParameter.Description: Bank 1 WPR first area B end page

RefParameter.Name: HDPState
RefParameter.Description:
Bits 31:24 HDP1EN[7:0]
Hide protection first area enable
0:No HDP area
1: HDP area is enabled

RefParameter.Name: HDPEndPage
RefParameter.Description:
Bits 6:0 HDP1EN[6:0]
Hide protection first area enable
0:No HDP area
1: HDP area is enabled

RefParameter.Name: BootLock
RefParameter.Description:
Bit 16 BOOT_LOCK: Forced boot from user area.
Un1:Boot based on the pad/option bit configuration.
1: Boot forced from main flash memory.
Caution: If the bit is set in association with RDP level 1, the debug capabilities are disabled, except in the case of a bad OBL (mismatch)

Condition.Expression: SEM_FLASH_OB_RDP & (SEM_FLASH_OB_USER | SEM_FLASH_BOR) & SEM_FLASH_OB_FLASH_SECURITY & SEM_FLASH_OB_PCROP & SEM_FLASH_OB_WRP1A & SEM_FLASH_OB_WRP1B & SEM_FLASH_OB_RDPKEY

OB_BOR_Level_active=true & SEM_OB_NRST_STOP_NULL & SEM_OB_NRST_STDBY_NULL & SEM_OB_NRST_SHDW_NULL & SEM_OB_IWDGSW_NULL & SEM_OB_IWDG_STOP_NULL & SEM_OB_IWDG_STDBY_NULL & SEM_OB_WWDGSW_NULL & SEM_OB_RAM_PARITY_CHECK_NULL & SEM_OB_nBOOT_SEL_NULL & SEM_OB_NBOOT1_NULL & SEM_OB_NBOOT0_NULL & SEM_OB_NRST_MODE_NULL & SEM_OB_INPUT_RESET_HOLDER_NULL
